cs4013project.vendingmachine

Interface VendingMachineMenu

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VendingMachineCMD, VendingMachineGUI

    public interface VendingMachineMenu
    VendingMachineMenu This interface is the base for both the VendingMachineCMD and VendimgMachineGUI classes, and contains all common methods between the two classes, as well as method headers that both will use.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run(VendingMachine machine)
        The interface for the vending machine.
        Parameters:
        machine - the Vending Machine currently in use.

      • readFiles

        default void readFiles(VendingMachine machine)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Reads from the Products, Money and Operator files. Adds products and coins to their arraylists as well as adding their quantities to their own arraylists. Separates operator details for use in another method.
        Parameters:
        machine - the Vending Machine currently in use.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Throws:
